term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - concentration distribution ratio, D_c, in chromatography
term.title: concentration distribution ratio

item.text: The ratio of the analytical concentration of a component in the stationary phase to its analytical concentration in the mobile phase.

item.alttext: Dc = (amount of component/cm3 of stationary phase)/(amount of compount/cm3 of mobile phase)
item.latex: D_{\text{c}}=\frac{\text{amount of component}/\text{cm}^{3}\text{of stationary phase}}{\text{amount of component}/\text{cm}^{3}\text{of mobile phase}}
